1.content:
Victorian Oriental Reform Education Academy for girls is a prestigious school with high class facilities but the dubious rep of being the last stop for delinquent girls from across Asia and the Pacific ring. It sit on its own inland in the center of a lake in the Japan's main inland. There was once was a shrine here but it was burned down in fire, whats left of the main shrine is on the hill behind the school. While the main building foundations was used as par of the schools construction. the school is 4 bildings, student dorms, school building, the gym building, and teachers dorm. other land marks are the shrine ruins top of the hill the abandoned mansion/castle of the miner lord that ruled the lake original opposite of the school the grave yard and the ferry dock. witch runs to the farming town and back 3 times a day 4 days a week, tuesday, thursday, saturday and Sunday.


The Goddess each have a aliened element, also beside each chosen weapon they all carry Katana and Wakizashi.

Water Goddess is a grate white scaled Naga with vary large breast (Fcup), red eyes pail skin and long white hair. Her weapon is a Naginata.

Earth Goddess is a Bakaneko with short red hair and fur, two tails and green eyes. Her weapon is a Kau Sin Ke.

Wind Goddess is a fearsome Tengu with black fathers and blue eyes, she has feet ands like a birds feet and wings of her back. Her weapon is a pair of twin Tessen (war fans).

Fire Goddess is a lovely Kitsune with gold and white fur, white eyes, blond hair done like a geisha and nine tails. Her weapon is a Yumi bow.

Lighting Goddess is a Oni looks human with blueish skin and 3 small yellow horns on her fore head, shor black hais and golden eyes, Her weapon is a Kanabo.

Agroup of girls brake curfue to go to the hill top shrine, but thing are about to go vary badly for the girls.

Atthe top of a forgoten and over growen stone stear cace is a large arch in frount of a old shrine the shrine is a single one room hut with a sliding door covered in sutras. In froun of the door is a old bell and offering box as well as the remains of inceacens sticks and other offering by more religes girls of the school.

15.content:
3 girls wallked up to the shrin from the school.They all had the schools unform a white bluse black skirt red neckerchif and kneesocks with black shoes.

"Are you sure its a good idea to come up here isint this place sacred or some thing?" asked Jen a blond girl clearly from a ameracen famly.

"Jan you got sent here cause you spared the word terrest on a moasc on the bace you dady is station at. Why would you cear?" Said Kokoro who had a lit ciguret between her lips (Kokoro is baced of late 80s shoolgirl delinqent witch often smoked just like the high schoolers in 50s movies in the USA)

"Thats diffrent. Beside i keep hearing scary stories about these old shrines, curese and evil spirets and sach." said Jen

"There not true i come here evey night befor test to pray to budda." said Chun-Li who had short red hair and was from china (her father was a Srteet fighter fan)

"I though its a Shinto shrine?" askked Jen puzzled.

"It is but, I think the spirets don't mind to mach. I always get A's on my tests so, I think there happy to get offerings at all in these times." said Chun-Li

They looked at the offering box, incents bowl and bell. Then Chun-Li pulled out a incents stick and lit it of Kokoros ciguret. She then set in the bowl to burn droped a coin in the box claped twice and rang the bell 3 time then claped again.

(to any one reading this that better knowes shinto religen and prayer rites or how japanese shrin work pls dont be ofaned i only have what i seen in anime and manga so if you see any thing wrong in what was portrayed dont hesate to on site emial me with what it is.)

"What in side?" asked Jen pointing to the doors sealed with a sutras.

Chun-Li shruged and Kokoro said "Not sure realy never been in, looks like no one has for years."

Jen went up to the door her curiosty over comin her earlyer fears. "Hay dont do that im not that rilages but brake seals is realy bad idea and karma." said Kokoro looking nervus. Then there was a pop as the sutras broke and the door slid open. The room lookas if it was brad new as if time left it alone. In side was 5 small shrines boxes each sealed and each painted depicting a goddess and had a weapons in frount of them on a stand.

The girls looked at the mini shrines one caught Chun-Lis eye and made her nervas. "The other 4 are all spirets or goddess but this is a Oni. Why is it here?" The mini shrine had a the image of the a linghing stom and in it was a blueish skin oni girl with 3 yellow horns on her forhead short sraguly black hair and gold eyes. She was holding a kanabo in on hand and drinking from a saka gourd in the other hand she wore a tiger skin pesent robe.

"So this is a Kanabo...." said Kokoro as she tried to lift it but endded up droping in to the floor "Its pure iron mosut waigh over 300 pounds."

Just then it started sparking and all 3 girls where hit by a bolt of electricity puting them to the ground as the Mini shrine opened riping its seal. The girls could only watch as the oni apired and colcted her weapons. Then she looked at the girls and licked her lips. "My what soft sappule bodys......"
